detail_desc: 5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Swim cap with a peak at the front and a flap at the back to protect the back of the neck.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Tight fit. The top is made from recycled polyester.
Fully lined lace bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps, a decorative pendant at the top, wide flounce at the front and no fasteners. Matching bottoms.
Knee-length shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs.

Short dress in soft washed denim made from Tencel™ lyocell with a collar, button placket, chest pockets and yoke with a pleat at the back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a partially concealed drawstring at the waist, diagonal welt side pockets, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Short dress in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline front and back and a seam and narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and a seam at the hem with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood, front pockets and a tie belt at the waist.
Straight-cut top in jersey crêpe with an opening and button at the back of the neck, lace yoke and short sleeves.

Fancy dress set with an Alice band and hair elastic with hair extensions. Satin-covered Alice band with tulle veil and padded appliqués in the shape of ears and a glittery unicorn horn on top. Ears with shimmering reversible sequins at the front. Hair elastic with curly hair extensions. Length approx. 40 cm. No metal clips.
Plastic hair claws. Width 3.5 cm.
T-shirts in soft jersey. The cotton content of the T-shirts is organic.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
V-neck satin top with a lace trim at the top and super-skinny shoulder straps. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with an embroidered pattern. V-neck with ties at the neckline, a smocked seam at the waist and long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow covered elastication at the cuffs. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
5-pocket shorts in stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hem. Slim fit.
Baby Exclusive. Tube scarf knitted in a soft cotton and silk blend.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Knee-length skirt in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, buttons down the front and side pockets with a decorative flap and button. Unlined.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a bow at the front, a grosgrain trim around the top and an elastic strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Spacious shopper in soft imitation leather with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Soft brushed inside. Size 16x31x39 cm.

Shirt dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and seam with a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with small, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Knee-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a high, gathered waist, pockets in the side seams, a concealed zip in the side and lace at the hem. Lined.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft textured knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Imitation suede jacket with a soft faux fur lining and a faux fur collar with a tab and metal buckle. Zip down the front, side pockets and faux fur cuffs.
Narrow imitation leather belts in different designs with a metal buckle. Width approx. 1.4 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Gently fitted, sleeveless jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar and a concealed press-stud at the front. Tie belt at the waist, welt front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Cropped, sleeveless, one-shoulder top in shimmering metallic jersey. One open shoulder and one wide shoulder strap.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Poncho in a soft knit containing some wool with open sides. Length at the front and back 80 cm.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with a small frill trim at the top and a high, elasticated waist with decorative ties.
Leggings in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside..
Face paint crayons in various colours. 6x2.2 g.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a gathered neckline and short puff sleeves.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with long sleeves, a seam at the top and gently flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short, fitted dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Lapped shoulders, decorative scalloped trims at the top, long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Vest top in soft organic cotton jersey.

Knitted jacket with a soft fleece lining, hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, front pockets and jersey inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs. Trims in contrasting colour jersey around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Slip-on trainers in cotton canvas with an elastic gore at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Long-sleeved tops in cotton jersey with a V-neck and chest pocket.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with laser-cut edges. V-shaped waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Suede court shoes with open sides and pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Jumper in a soft, double-knitted cotton blend with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and tapered sleeves.
Puff pants in organic cotton slub jersey with a front section in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and elasticated, frill-trimmed hems.

Short, flared beach dress in an airy cotton weave with a deep V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with hole embroidery and trumpet cuffs and gathered, hole-embroidered seams creating tiers for width and movement. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved jumper in jacquard-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck cardigan in an airy, fine-knit viscose blend with a wrapover front with sewn-in ties at the waist, 3/4-length sleeves with gently flared cuffs and ribbed trims around the opening.
Dungaree shorts in woven fabric with a double-layered front and open back. Shoulder straps with adjustable fasteners, a tie belt at the waist and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Long dress with a lace bodice partly lined in satin with side support and a concealed zip in one side. Short cap sleeves, a grosgrain seam at the waist and a lined, pleated skirt in chiffon.
Glittery Alice band with ears and padded antlers on top.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fancy dress all-in-one suit in soft pile with a zip down the front and hood with appliqués and sewn-on ears. Narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
A pair of hoop earrings decorated with long pendants featuring faceted plastic beads and pearly plastic beads.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the waist and tiers to the hem. Unlined.
Metal chain necklaces. One in thin metal chain with a feather-shaped pendant, the other with a pendant in reconstituted stone. Length 50 cm and 65 cm.

Shirt in cotton corduroy with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems. Brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Dungaree dress in soft stretch denim with adjustable straps with press-studs. Chest pocket, fake front pockets, press-studs at the sides and one back pocket. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Platform sandals with open toes, crossover foot straps and an adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm. Heel 10 cm.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Soft lace nursing bras with opening, cotton-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Slides in imitation suede with crossover straps. Imitation suede insoles and fluted soles.
Soft cotton towel with a hood. Patterned velour front and terry back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Set with a short-sleeved top and pair of treggings. Top in cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Treggings in sturdy, patterned jersey with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
